itemizedlist.listitem: Properties of Lookup File : The name of the file can be set through property manager of the service. The authentication methods include options of password or certificate, depending on originating site. Access Mode can be 'readonly' or 'update'.

sect3.title: Environment variables related to the "CORAL/Services/XMLLookupService" component

itemizedlist.listitem: CORAL_DBLOOKUP_PATH : a path environment variable, where the XML input file is searched for. The current working directory has always higher priority.

sect3.title: Connection related service parameters
sect3.para:
Currently three parameters are supported (see ConnectionService documentation for their meaning and usage):
ConnectionRetrialPeriod.
ConnectionRetrialTimeOut.
ConnectionTimeOut.
